required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Assess Pharmacokinetics (PK) of Preladenant in Participants With Chronic Renal Impairment (CRI) (P06512)
clinical_study.official_title: A Study to Assess Pharmacokinetics of Preladenant in Subjects With Chronic Renal Impairment

brief_summary.textblock: This is a two part study to compare the PK of preladenant administered to participants with CRI to the PK of preladenant administered to healthy participants. Part 1 will compare the PK of participants with severe CRI to healthy participants. Part 2 will compare the PK of participants with moderate CRI and participants with mild CRI to healthy participants. The primary hypotheses are that the plasma area under the concentration-time curve from time 0 to infinity after single dosing (AUC0-∞) of preladenant in participants with either severe, moderate or mild CRI is similar to that of matched healthy participants.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve From Time 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞) After Single Dosing With Preladenant for Participants With Severe CRI Versus Healthy Matched Controls
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples were taken at the following timepoints: pre-dose, 0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 16, 24, 30, 36 and 48 hours postdose in order to determine the AUC0-∞ of preladenant

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-∞ After Single Dosing With Preladenant for Participants With Moderate CRI Versus Healthy Matched Controls
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples were taken at the following timepoints: pre-dose, 0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 16, 24, 30, 36 and 48 hours postdose in order to determine the AUC0-∞ of preladenant

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-∞ After Single Dosing With Preladenant for Participants With Mild CRI Versus Healthy Matched Controls
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples were taken at the following timepoints: pre-dose, 0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 16, 24, 30, 36 and 48 hours postdose in order to determine the AUC0-∞ of preladenant

arm_group.description: Participants with severe CRI, defined as creatinine clearance of <30 mL/min/1.73 m^2, were treated with a single tablet of 5 mg preladenant, administered orally
Participants with moderate CRI defined as creatinine clearance of ≥30 and <50 mL/min/1.73 m^2, were treated with a single tablet of 5 mg preladenant, administered orally
Participants with mild CRI, defined as creatinine clearance of ≥50 and ≤80 mL/min/1.73m^2, were treated with a single tablet of 5 mg preladenant, administered orally
Participants with normal renal function, defined as creatinine clearance of >80 mL/min/1.73 m^2, were treated with a single tablet of 5 mg preladenant, administered orally
Participants with normal renal function, defined as creatinine clearance of >80 mL/min/1.73 m^2, were treated with a single tablet of 5 mg preladenant, administered orally

intervention.description: After an overnight fast, a single 5 mg dose, (1 x 5 mg tablet) was administered orally

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Has a body mass index (BMI) between 19 to 34 kg/m^2, inclusive
- Has mild to severe CRI and not on dialysis (Participants with normal renal function are to be matched to subjects with renal impairment)
- Clinical laboratory tests, electrocardiogram, and vital signs within normal ranges
- Free of any clinically significant disease that would interfere with the study evaluations (except related to his/her renal disease and comorbid conditions)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Females who are pregnant, intend to become pregnant (within 3 months of ending the study), or are nursing/breastfeeding
- Any surgical or medical condition which might significantly alter the absorption, distribution, metabolism or excretion of any drug
- Had a renal transplant or are on dialysis
- Has a history of any infectious disease within 4 weeks
- Is positive for hepatitis B surface antigen, hepatitis C antibodies or human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)
- Has donated blood or had a blood transfusions in the past 60 days
- Has demonstrated allergic reactions (eg, food, drug, atopic reactions or asthmatic episodes) which could interfere with their ability to participate in the trial
- Has a history of malignancy
- Has evidence of suicidality or is at risk for self-harm or harm to others

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Male or female adults with different degrees of renal impairment along with matched healthy adults with normal renal function were selected for this study.

group.title: Part 1: Severe Renal Impairment
group.description: Participants with severe chronic renal impairment (CRI), defined as creatinine clearance of <30 mL/min/1.73 m^2, were treated with a single tablet of 5 mg preladenant, administered orally

group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve From Time 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞) After Single Dosing With Preladenant for Participants With Severe CRI Versus Healthy Matched Controls
outcome.description: Blood samples were taken at the following timepoints: pre-dose, 0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 16, 24, 30, 36 and 48 hours postdose in order to determine the AUC0-∞ of preladenant
outcome.population: Four participants with severe CRI, and two matched healthy participants with insufficient terminal phase data to allow adequate characterization, were not analyzed. As only participants with severe CRI are presented, participants with mild or moderate CRI or their corresponding healthy matched controls were not analyzed in this outcome measure

measure.title: Area Under the Concentration-time Curve From Time 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞) After Single Dosing With Preladenant for Participants With Severe CRI Versus Healthy Matched Controls
measure.description: Blood samples were taken at the following timepoints: pre-dose, 0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 1, 2, 4, 6, 12, 16, 24, 30, 36 and 48 hours postdose in order to determine the AUC0-∞ of preladenant
measure.population: Four participants with severe CRI, and two matched healthy participants with insufficient terminal phase data to allow adequate characterization, were not analyzed. As only participants with severe CRI are presented, participants with mild or moderate CRI or their corresponding healthy matched controls were not analyzed in this outcome measure

analysis.non_inferiority_desc: Geometric Mean Ratio (GMR) is contained within the interval [0.50, 2.00]

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The investigator agrees not to publish or publicly present any interim results of the trial without the prior written consent of the sponsor. The investigator further agrees to provide to the sponsor 45 days prior to submission for publication or presentation, review copies of abstracts or manuscripts for publication that report any results of the trial.

point_of_contact.name_or_title: Senior Vice President, Global Clinical Development
